V.iii.12.A.1.c
.
Evaluating Progressive Spinal Muscular Atrophy
Progressive muscular atrophy,
38 CFR 4.124a, diagnostic code (DC) 8023
, refers to progressive spinal muscular atrophy, which is a disease of the spinal cord.
Progressive muscular atrophy is subject to presumptive SC under
38 CFR 3.309(a)
because it is an organic disease of the nervous system.
